ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Songs....
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope this is semi-accurate at least.  I was really getting hot under the collar after seeing on EQCasters that Wizards are getting a new 39th level spell
ygData.messageBody:
I hope this is semi-accurate at least. I was really getting hot under the
collar after seeing on EQCasters that Wizards are getting a new 39th level
spell among others for various other caster classes. Seeing that lvl 39
though really tweaked me though so I didn't look into it any further.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 06, 2000 11:00 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Songs....


Found this on another mailing list.....Enjoy
